# AxisMarkPreset

**Structure**

Describes preset styles for axis markers.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AxisMarkPreset
```

## Type Properties

- **aligned**: The aligned axis markers style.
- **automatic**: Automatically determines the marker style.
- **extended**: The extended axis markers style.
- **inset**: The inset axis markers style.

## Supporting types

- **AxisMarkValues**: Describes the values the axis markers will present (one for each value).
- **AxisMarkPosition**: Describes the position of axis markers.

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible

items.description: Describes the values the axis markers will present (one for each value).
